fullName: CURD Operations for Assignment Module: Check if user able to update a record with valid AssignmentID and missing mandatory field Assignment Description for Assignment Module

name: Check if user able to update a record with valid AssignmentID and missing mandatory field Assignment Description for Assignment Module

steps.name: Given  User creates PUT Request for the LMS API endpoint and Valid Assignment Id for Assignment Module
When  User sends PUT Request and request Body for Assignment Module from excel "AssignmentModule" and 10 for negative
Then  User receives 400 Bad Request Status with message and boolean success details for missing mandatory field assignment description for update
